name: bunny game!
description:
A game made for our code final :)

Run from enemies, collect coins and carrots, and progress through five worlds to rescue the princess bunny! Each level has different obstacles to try and stop you from doing so, from seals that shoot snowballs to keys and locks!

Controls:
  • WASD to move (left, right, jump). You can jump midair if you haven’t used a jump yet. 
  • Alternate controls: Space and Arrow Keys for jumping and moving respectively.
  • Ctrl + Enter to skip level
  • Fullscreen button in corner (Esc to exit then esc again to pause)
Art by:
  • https://www.pixilart.com/pokiemac
  • https://www.pixilart.com/mferrer1
  • https://www.pixilart.com/keagana1
